scripts.prestart: echo '[PRESTART] Starting Prisma setup...' && rm -rf ../node_modules/.prisma ../node_modules/@prisma/client node_modules/.prisma node_modules/@prisma/client 2>/dev/null || true && cd .. && echo '[PRESTART] Running migrations...' && npx prisma migrate deploy && echo '[PRESTART] Generating Prisma client...' && npx prisma generate && cd server && echo '[PRESTART] Prisma setup complete!' || echo '[PRESTART] Prisma setup failed, continuing...'
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf ../node_modules/.prisma ../node_modules/@prisma/client node_modules/.prisma node_modules/@prisma/client 2>/dev/null || true && cd .. && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && cd server || echo 'Prisma setup failed in postinstall'
